title: Coordination of Ti3+ and Ni3+ to promote the electrocatalytic OER properties of SrTiO3@TiO2 heterojunctions
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,3341-3346
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00258J, Paper
Yanqin Bi, Zenghua Zhao, Jianhua Qian, Liangliang Chen, Chunyang Duan
Transition metal doped SrTiO3@TiO2 materials promote the formation of Ti3+ ions, contribute to the separation of photogenerated electron hole pairs and broaden the visible light response.
